nodes.name: addOwner
removeOwner
addOwner
removeOwner

addOwner(address).author: Jordi Guirao
addOwner(address).return: true if the address was added to the ownerslist, false if the address was already in the ownerslist

removeOwner(address).author: Jordi Guirao
removeOwner(address).return: true if the address was removed from the ownerslist, false if the address wasn't in the ownerslist in the first place

addOwner(address).notice: add an address to the ownerslist

removeOwner(address).notice: remove an address from the ownerslist
